strong: Responsibilities of Software Engineer at Expedia

li: Design, develop, debug, and modify components of machine learning and deep learning systems and applications, including data pipelines
li.1: Develop & tune model training and inference systems
li.2: Complete documentation and procedures for installation and maintenance
li.3: Actively participate in group technology reviews to critique work of self and others
li.4: Run machine learning tests and experiments
li.6: Study and transform data science prototypes
li.7: Select appropriate datasets and data representation methods
li.8: Extend existing ML libraries and frameworks Qualifications

strong: Responsibilities for Software Engineer at Expedia

li: Proven experience as a Machine Learning Engineer or similar role
li.1: 4-5 years of experience in software development
li.2: Exposure to No SQL databases like MongoDB
li.3: Ability to write robust code in one or more Python, Java, and Scala
li.4: Familiarity with machine learning frameworks (like Keras or PyTorch) and libraries (like scikit-learn)
li.5: Experience using Amazon Web Services (EC2, S3 etc) with data at scale
li.6: Proficient in core technologies like Spark, Hadoop and Hive

li.4: Medical, Dental, Vision (100% covered by employer)
